name: YouTube Dark Theme - OrriGo
description:
This style was created for the dark mode. Please activated in YouTube that theme to work properly. To activate use: https://www.youtube.com/new     then    https://goo.gl/4fpBZx
This style Cinema Mode (expands video to fill all free space in browser window) with Compact Mode and cool colors.
-------------------------------------------------------
NOTE: Please donate to support my work. Even just a little donation make my day and boost my confidence.
additional_info:
New - YouTube Dark Cinema Theme
           by OrriGo  v2.4
-----------------------------------------------------------------
NOTE1: Please donate to support my work. Even just a little 
donation make my day and boost my confidence.
-----------------------------------------------------------------
-	v2.3 	- fixed bugs
                        - color change
-	v2.2 	- fixed bugs
-	v2.0 	- color dislike and like green and red icon
			- color dislike and like green and red bar
			- subscribe button slim
			- floating search bar in cinema mode
			- square profile pictures
-  	v1.4 	- beter cinema mode
-  	v1.3 	- fixed bugs
			- color change
-  	v1.2 	- fixed bugs
			- subscriptions section compact
			- color change
- 	v1.1 	- fixed bugs
		
-----------------------------------------------------------------
NOTE2: This works just if you activate the new material theme on YouTube.
To activate: https://www.youtube.com/new  then   https://goo.gl/4fpBZx

discussions.name: This style in darkmode is really cool
